law.catch_line: Deadline for promulgation of certain administrative regulations by Finance and Administration Cabinet and Transportation Cabinet.
law.text:
By January 1, 1995:
The Finance and Administration Cabinet shall promulgate administrative regulations to implement its procurement of architectural and engineering services pursuant to KRS 45A.800 to 45A.835; and
The Transportation Cabinet shall promulgate administrative regulations to implement its procurement of engineering services pursuant to KRS 45A.800 to 45A.835.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1994.
